pages.text:
About Us
Our Mission
At Sunset Riverfront Event Center, our mission is to create extraordinary weddings that reflect your unique love story. We understand that every couple has a vision for their perfect day, and we are here to bring that vision to life. With a commitment to excellence and a passion for detail, we provide comprehensive Daytona Beach Wedding Management services that guarantee an unforgettable experience for you and your guests.
Unmatched Riverfront Experience
Set on the picturesque edge of the Halifax River, Sunset Riverfront Event Center provides breathtaking riverfront views that serve as the perfect backdrop for your wedding or event. Our venue features two distinct spaces designed to cater to your needs and preferences:
The Exquisite Banquet Hall:
With a capacity to host up to 330 guests, our indoor banquet hall boasts a 14-foot high all-glass wall that offers uninterrupted views of the water. The elegant and modern design ensures a sophisticated setting for your celebration, whether you’re hosting a grand wedding reception or an elegant soirée.
The Scenic Riverdeck:
For those who prefer an outdoor setting, our 400-guest capacity riverdeck, complemented by a 200-foot long pier, provides a stunning venue for ceremonies and receptions. The expansive deck and pier offer unparalleled views of the Halifax River, creating a serene and picturesque environment for your event.
Signature Wedding Packages
Our signature “Complete Wedding Services” package are designed to cater to every aspect of your wedding day, offering a customizable and all-inclusive experience. These packages are crafted to meet all your needs, providing you with a seamless planning process and ensuring that every detail is covered.
Comprehensive Customization:
Our packages are entirely customizable to fit your specific vision and requirements. Whether you’re planning an intimate gathering or a large celebration, our packages offer flexibility to match your style and preferences.
One-Stop Shopping:
Enjoy a one-stop shopping experience with our all-inclusive packages that address every aspect of your wedding day. From the initial planning stages to the final moments of your celebration, our team is here to handle all the details.
On-Site Catering
Elevate your event with our on-site catering services, featuring delectable menus from Florida’s renowned Moore Fine Foods. With over 20 years of experience, Moore Fine Foods specializes in crafting traditional and modern culinary delights that add a unique and distinctive touch to any occasion. Whether you’re seeking gourmet hors d’oeuvres, elegant entrees, or indulgent desserts, our catering team will create a memorable dining experience for you and your guests.
Diverse Menus:
Our catering services offer a variety of options to suit your preferences, including custom menus tailored to fit your theme and dietary requirements.
Exceptional Quality
: Moore Fine Foods is celebrated for its creative and high-quality cuisine, ensuring that your event features exceptional food that will delight and impress.
Book Your Dream Beach Wedding Today!
Ready to start planning your dream wedding? Contact Sunset Riverfront Event Center today to schedule a consultation. We look forward to working with you to create a beautiful and memorable celebration that reflects your unique love story.
Contact Sunset Riverfront Event Center for personalized event planning and tours. Call (386) 795-0900 or email us today.
